comments.author: andschwa
andschwa
comments.body: This is super strange, but commit 78defa739d8729b211844d21c9e18730aa2f0648 breaks tab completion of `System.Console` types. That is `[System.Console]::<tab>` doesn't iterate through the types, which makes me think the catalog (or generator) is bad.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Ah ha! The `TypeCatalogGen` tool fails to catalog types that are forwarded to `mscorlib.dll`, which is the cause of the types no longer tab-completing.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: I don't think this is a blocker to merge.

comments.author: palladia
comments.body: Checked PSReadline on Windows, and it supports Ctrl-Left/Right Arrow and Control-Home and Control-End.
